version_description:
added the ability to choose a category for a new item when adding a new item from dictionary page
added question to ask confirmation before clearing list
fixed crash on iPad version when hiding keyboard from the "Dismiss Keyboard" button
minor improvements on iPad version
iOS 10 support

-Bought Items are no longer displayed below list names in "Lists" page
-General improvements

-A Delete button has been added in the main page
-Library: Favorites section only lists items entered
-You can remove an item from favorites
-Duplication feature duplicates notes too
-You can add multiple items to a category at once

-You can now move an item from a list to another list
-You can edit theme for each list
-Bug with item deletion from category page has been fixed

-You can sort items when categories are displayed.
-"Starter lists" have been added: you can create lists that will allow you to create shopping lists faster.
-Dictionary button has been moved and it now contains categories and items only.
-A Favorites button has been added: it contains list of most used items and starter lists.
-A Sorting button has been added and allows to show/hide categories, edit categories and sort items by alphabetic order.
-General improvements
-iPad version has been improved

-New design
-New button to add items to list with one tap instead of 2
-New setting to choose how to cross off items
-New setting to display number of remaining items on app's icon
-You can order lists in Lists page
-New button which replaces following actions: "tap long on item" & "swipe finger from right to left"
-New function to copy item from list into another one
-When adding items to list, items already present in list are now grayed

This new version is easier to use
New design for iPad version
Added Split View / Slide over Support
Optimized for iPad Pro

-Suggestions are no longer grayed out if they are already present in the list
-When adding an item to list, it won't be duplicated anymore if it is already in the list
-When checking off an item, it will be moved to the top of purchased items list
-Fixed issue with item editing on iPad
-Improved iPhone 7 version in landscape orientation
-Improved design
-General improvements

-Added iOS 11 support
-iPhone 6/7/8 Plus versions display now current list and menu on the same screen in landscape orientation
-The same item can be added multiple times in the list if its notes are different
-General improvements

Added support for Apple Watch
Improved widget
General improvements

Improved Apple Watch version
General improvements

-Optimized for iPhone X
-Improved visuals

-The app is easier to use
-You can assign a category to an item directly when adding an item to a list
-The iPhone X version has been improved
Fixed issue with categories when editing item name and quantity in list

-A dark mode has been added
-General improvements and misc bug fixes

A new "Night Blue" theme has been added
Minor Improvements

-Added an option to automatically sort purchased items by alphabetic order
-Added an option to keep screen turned on
-Adopted 3D Touch to see a preview of a list from Lists page
General improvements

Good news! The app is now downloadable for FREE for everyone!
Many novelties and improvements in this update!

An In-App Purchase has been added for 2 new optional features: Lists Syncing and Sharing using Apple's iCloud service. No subscriptions, one purchase for life!

News:

-You just need to tap on a row of an item to add it to the list
-You have to tap on the "..." button on the right of the item to add quantity, category, description or price
-You can sort lists by tapping and holding any list
-You can sort items by tapping and holding any item
-Night Blue theme is offered to everyone
-Dark and Night Blue themes were improved
-New setting not to export purchased items
-New languages: Spanish, German and Italian
-Many minor improvements

The In-App Purchase allows you to:

-Sync your lists between all your devices

Changes made on lists, items, templates and catalog of items are automatically updated on all of your devices logged in with the same iCloud account

-Share your lists with other users in real time

Lists can be shared in real time with other users provided that they own an iPhone and/or iPad

General improvements
New setting to display quantity after name
it is now possible to move an item from a list to another one
User interface has been improved
User interface has been improved
Fixed compatibility with iOS 13.0 and iCloud sharing (There was no problem with iOS 13.1)

Ads have been added to the Free version.

By upgrading to the Pro Version, you can:

◉ Remove ads from the app
◉ Synchronize your lists and items between all your Apple devices (iPhone and iPad)
◉ Share lists in real time with other users
◉ Backup your lists and catalog of items
◉ Duplicate your lists
◉ Move an item from a list to another one
◉ Choose the night and dark themes
◉ Choose a theme for each list

Added iOS 13 support
Improved List Sharing
Added ability to copy item from list to another one
Added swipe right gesture to quickly edit item
Improved Item edition page
Improved night and dark themes
Inverted display item, quantity

A new Black Theme has been added (iOS 13 only)
For iPhone Plus and Max, when device is rotated from landscape to portrait, the Current List page is now displayed instead of the Lists page

General improvements
New setting to display quantity after name

-The application automatically adjusts to the appearance of your device (iPhone or iPad)
-You can now change order of categories by holding a category in all pages where there is a list of categories
-An Edit button has been added to the Lists page
-The iPad app has been improved

-New menu and new buttons (for iOS13)
-Categories are now synced for shared lists (all apps must be up tp date)
-You can move an item from a category to another one directly by tapping and holding an item in the main page
-You can change list templates order
-A new independant function has been added to print list
-iPad version has been improved
-A FAQ page has been added
-Many minor improvements

Added images to categories
Improved categories syncing for shared lists
Added shortcut buttons to categories, list templates and favorite items
Improved Apple Watch version (texts could be truncated)

-You can now move multiple items from a category to another one at once
-You can access categories even faster by tapping a category from the main list

-Categories sync has been improved for shared lists
-Quantites are now included when duplicating lists
-General improvements

-Menu has been simplified (2 features have been moved to the main page)
-General improvements

-An image has been added if list is empty
-General improvements

-Syncing of categories in shared lists has been improved
-General improvements
The total price of checked/unchecked items is now displayed

-Better support of text with big font size
-Better management of prices
-Prices are now used when duplicating lists
-General improvements
General improvements
iOS 14 support

- Added an option to sync categories of items within lists shared between users
- The local currency is now used for prices
- Improved lists syncing
- Added direct access to Settings page from within the Menu page
- Added a link to new Instagram account for those who want to contact support by this way
- Many general improvements

- Added back up of prices to iCloud
- Added syncing of prices within lists shared between users
- Improved syncing of categories within lists shared between users
- Added ability to add an item to list by tapping on a clear part of the screen
- Many general improvements thanks to users' feedbacks
